p: Moringa oleifera seeds are rich in minerals (Table 3) of which potassium, phosphorus, sodium, zinc, magnesium, and calcium are the principal minerals. Ijarotimi et al. ( 2013) revealed that M. oleifera seeds exhibited a Ca/P ratio higher than 1, while the Na/K ratio is higher than the recommended value (0.60) (Nieman, Butterworth, & Nieman, 1992). However, the mineral composition of M. oleifera seeds differs significantly (Table 3) from one region of the world to another.
